text: Today we see a human population of over 6 billion people, many of whom have serious medical conditions, which either can't be treated or cannot be treated economically.
author: Ralph Merkle

text: I can help a lot of other people who've gone through the same thing by building a center that will help men and women who don't have the funds to take care of themselves and get the medical treatment.
author: David Gest

text: Long gone are the days when hospital stays and surgeries made up the bulk of seniors' annual medical expenses.
author: Jim Gerlach

text: Without true medical liability reform, our doctors will continue to leave, and young doctors coming out of medical school $100,000 to $200,000 in debt will not be able to afford such onerous costs.
author: Jim Gerlach

text: Informed consent is required for every invasive medical procedure, from getting your ears pierced to having an abortion.
